Trigger.name: Prompt
Trigger.script: dreadnought.balance = false

regexCodeList.string: ^\[\d+\-hull, \d+\-power, \w+ damage, \d+\-will \*(\w+)?\*\]$

Trigger.name: Aetherbalance
Trigger.script: dreadnought.balance = true

regexCodeList.string: x

Trigger.name: Chair Locked
Trigger.script:
enableAlias("Pilot") enableTrigger("Pilot") disableTrigger("Autopilot") send("config shipsight 1") send("config aethermap on") dreadnought.pilot.reset()
sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"aethercraft"}]]) send("\n")

regexCodeList.string: You step up to the command chair, locking yourself into the module and linking your mind to the controls of the ship. After a moment, you begin to sense your command of the module in your own brain.

Trigger.name: Chair Unlocked
Trigger.script: disableAlias("Pilot") disableTrigger("Pilot") disableTrigger("Autopilot") send("config shipsight 0") send("config aethermap off") dreadnought.pilot.reset()

regexCodeList.string: With a long, slow blink, you allow your mind to drift free from the ship, and release your lock on the command of the command chair.

Trigger.name: Grid Locked
Trigger.script:
enableAlias("Empath") enableTrigger("Empath") enableTrigger("Grid Setup") send("grid modules") send("config shipsight 0") send("config aethermap off") dreadnought.empath.reset()
sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"aethercraft"}]]) send("\n")

regexCodeList.string: You step up to the empathic grid, locking yourself into the module and linking your mind to the controls of the ship. After a moment, you begin to sense your command of the module in your own brain.

Trigger.name: Grid Unlocked
Trigger.script: disableAlias("Empath") disableTrigger("Empath") send("config shipsight 0") send("config aethermap off") dreadnought.empath.reset()

regexCodeList.string: With a long, slow blink, you allow your mind to drift free from the ship, and release your lock on the command of the empathic grid.

Trigger.name: Turret Locked
Trigger.script:
enableAlias("Combateer") enableTrigger("Combateer") send("config shipsight 0") send("config aethermap off")
sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"aethercraft"}]]) send("\n")
enableTrigger("Turret Setup") send("p turret")

regexCodeList.string: You step up to a battle turret, locking yourself into the module and linking your mind to the controls of the ship. After a moment, you begin to sense your command of the module in your own brain.

Trigger.name: Turret Unlocked
Trigger.script: disableAlias("Combateer") disableTrigger("Combateer") send("config shipsight 0") send("config aethermap off")

regexCodeList.string: With a long, slow blink, you allow your mind to drift free from the ship, and release your lock on the command of a battle turret.

Trigger.name: Collector Locked
Trigger.script: enableAlias("Collector") enableTrigger("Collector") send("config shipsight 0") send("config aethermap off")

regexCodeList.string: You step up to an energy collector, locking yourself into the module and linking your mind to the controls of the ship. After a moment, you begin to sense your command of the module in your own brain.

Trigger.name: Collector Unlocked
Trigger.script: disableAlias("Collector") disableTrigger("Collector") send("config shipsight 0") send("config aethermap off")

regexCodeList.string: With a long, slow blink, you allow your mind to drift free from the ship, and release your lock on the command of an energy collector.

Trigger.name: Aetherbeast Summoned
Trigger.script:
dreadnought.pilot.aetherbeastPresent = true dreadnought.aetherbeastCount = dreadnought.aetherbeastCount + 1
send("shipt Target " .. matches[2]) dreadnought.autopilot()
if dreadnought.pilot.siphonCallout == true then killTimer("dreadnought.pilot.calloutTimer") dreadnought.pilot.siphonCallout = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^Drawn by the flux of energy, a \w+ (\w+) suddenly wanders into the nearby area\.$
^Drawn by the flux of energy, a six-headed (\w+) suddenly wanders into the nearby area\.$

Trigger.name: Karibidean Summoned
Trigger.script:
dreadnought.pilot.aetherbeastPresent = true dreadnought.aetherbeastCount = dreadnought.aetherbeastCount + 1
send("shipt Batten down the hatches! A karibidean approaches!") send("shipt Target karibidean") flowerbox("red", "KARIBIDEAN!!!") dmsg("Switching to manual override!")
dreadnought.autopilot() disableTrigger("Autopilot")

regexCodeList.string: The energy vortex flashes and a vortex karibidean flies out of it.

Trigger.name: Aetherbeast Enters
Trigger.script: dreadnought.pilot.aetherbeastPresent = true dreadnought.autopilot()

regexCodeList.string: enters from the \w+ on the aetherways\.$

Trigger.name: Entering Shockwave
Trigger.script: dreadnought.pilot.shocked = true

regexCodeList.string: ^You are thrust forward as(?:\s\w+(?:\'\w+)?)+ shudders violently and comes to a complete stop\.$
The command chair is unresponsive to your requests.

Trigger.name: Freed From Shockwave
Trigger.script: dreadnought.pilot.shocked = false dreadnought.autopilot()

regexCodeList.string: I am clearing the command chair of all impairments\."$
^With a ripple,(?:\s\w+(?:\'\w+)?)+ frees itself from its shockwave\.$

Trigger.name: Aetherbeast Dies
Trigger.script:
if dreadnought.aetherbeastCount > 0 then dreadnought.aetherbeastCount = dreadnought.aetherbeastCount - 1 end
if dreadnought.aetherbeastCount == 0 then dreadnought.pilot.siphonCallout = true end
dreadnought.autopilot()

regexCodeList.string: ^(?:\w+\s){3}suddenly explodes\!$
A six-headed scyllus suddenly explodes!

Trigger.name: Pilot Balance
Trigger.script: dreadnought.balance = true dreadnought.autopilot()

regexCodeList.string: The command chair whirrs quietly, ready to be used once again.

Trigger.name: Ship Move
Trigger.script: dreadnought.pilot.aetherbeastPresent = false

regexCodeList.string: ^You steer(?:\s\w+(?:\'\w+)?)+ to the \w+\.$

Trigger.name: Siphon Callout

regexCodeList.string: An energy vortex pulsates brightly.

Trigger.name: Shockwave Timer
Trigger.script: table.insert(dreadnought.pilot.shockwaveTimers, tempTimer(3420, function () -- Fire after 57 minutes flowerbox("red", "YOUR SHOCKWAVES ARE ABOUT TO EXPIRE!!") send("shipt The shockwaves are about to expires. We'll stop and collect the dust until then.") killTimer(table.remove(dreadnought.pilot.shockwaveTimers, 1)) end))

regexCodeList.string: A nearby turret blankets aetherspace with bolts of crackling energy, which ripple around this space in waves of coruscating power.

Trigger.name: Highlights
Trigger.script: selectCurrentLine() fg("green")

regexCodeList.string: ^With a ripple,(?:\s\w+(?:\'\w+)?)+ frees itself from its shockwave\.$
The command chair whirrs quietly, ready to be used once again.
^(?:\w+\s){3}suddenly explodes\!$
A six-headed scyllus suddenly explodes!

Trigger.name: Grid Setup
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == "chair" then dreadnought.empath.modules.chair = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "orb" then dreadnought.empath.modules.orb = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "grid" then dreadnought.empath.modules.grid = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "cube" then dreadnought.empath.modules.cube = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "turret" then table.insert(dreadnought.empath.modules.turrets, matches[3]) elseif matches[2] == "collector" then table.insert(dreadnought.empath.modules.collectors, matches[3]) end

Trigger.name: Finish Setup
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Grid Setup", 0) disableTrigger("Grid Setup") dmsg("The empathic grid is set up and ready for your control.")

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Damaged
Trigger.script: heap.insert(dreadnought.empath.commands, action("hull", 2, "grid repair hull")) dreadnought.repairShip()

regexCodeList.string: concussive shock rips through the hull.$
swiftly shears through her hull.$
rips apart her hull.$
shreds deep rends through her hull.$
^Violet sparks fly through the air and
^\(Ship\): \w+ says, \"Repair.\"$
cries out as bolts of jagged energy strike out from the ruptured fabric of aetherspace here.$

Trigger.name: Repaired
Trigger.script: if heap.head(dreadnought.empath.commands).name == "hull" then heap.extract(dreadnought.empath.commands) end

regexCodeList.string: Bright tendrils of energy pulsate through the ship and heal the hull to full strength.

Trigger.name: Damaged
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= nil and matches[2] ~= "" and matches[4] ~= "no" then local module = matches[2] local priority = 0
if module == "grid" then priority = 3 elseif module == "chair" then priority = 5 elseif module == "turret" then priority = 6 elseif module == "collector" then priority = 7 elseif module == "orb" then priority = 8 elseif module == "cube" then priority = 9 else priority = 10 end
heap.insert(dreadnought.empath.commands, action(module, priority, "grid repair module " .. matches[3])) end

Trigger.name: End Damaged
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Damaged", 0) dreadnought.repairShip()

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Repaired
Trigger.script: if heap.head(dreadnought.empath.commands).name == matches[2] then heap.extract(dreadnought.empath.commands) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Crackling energy surges to \w+ \w+ (\w+), fully healing it\.$

Trigger.name: Already Repaired
Trigger.script: deleteLineP() heap.extract(dreadnought.empath.commands) dreadnought.repairShip()

regexCodeList.string: That module is already in full repair.
The ship's hull is already at maximum strength.

Trigger.name: Infected
Trigger.script: dreadnought.empath.slivvensFound = 0 enableTrigger("Slivven Check") send("grid modules")

regexCodeList.string: I have been infested by an aetheretic slivven!"$
^\(Ship\): (\w+) says, \"Check.\"$
"chair

Trigger.name: Found Slivven
Trigger.script:
dreadnought.empath.slivvensFound = dreadnought.empath.slivvensFound + 1
if #matches > 2 then send("shipt Captain, there's a slivven attacking " .. matches[3] .. "'s " .. matches[2]) else send("shipt Captain, there's a slivven attacking an unoccupied " .. matches[2]) end

Trigger.name: Finish Slivven Check
Trigger.script:
local slivvensFound = dreadnought.empath.slivvensFound
if slivvensFound == 0 then send("shipt No slivvens detected upon the ship, Captain.") elseif slivvensFound == 1 then send("shipt Only one slivven infecting the ship, Captain.") else send("shipt A total of " .. slivvensFound .. " slivvens infecting the ship, Captain.") end
setTriggerStayOpen("Slivven Check", 0) disableTrigger("Slivven Check")

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Call
Trigger.script: if dreadnought.empath.flags.haveClarity then heap.insert(dreadnought.empath.commands, action("clarity", 4, "grid clarity " .. dreadnought.modules.chair)) else send("shipt I can't, Captain! I'm not trained enough!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Ship\): (\w+) says, \"Clarity.\"$

Trigger.name: Emergency
Trigger.script: if dreadnought.empath.flags.haveClarity then heap.insert(dreadnought.empath.commands, action("emergency clarity", 1, "grid clarity " .. dreadnought.modules.chair)) else send("shipt I can't, Captain! I'm not trained enough!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Ship\): \w+ says, \"Emergency clarity\!\"$

Trigger.name: Finish
Trigger.script:
local actionName = heap.head(dreadnought.empath.commands).name
if actionName == "emergency clarity" or actionName == "clarity" then heap.extract(dreadnought.empath.commands) end

regexCodeList.string: I am clearing the command chair of all impairments."$
That module needs no clarity.

Trigger.name: Aetherbeast Dead
Trigger.script: if dreadnought.empath.flags.haveClarity then heap.insert(dreadnought.empath.commands, action("emergency clarity", 1, "grid clarity " .. dreadnought.empath.modules.chair)) dreadnought.repairShip() end

regexCodeList.string: suddenly explodes!$

Trigger.name: Turret On
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == gmcp.Char.Name.name then enableTrigger("Gunner") tempTimer(0.1, [[send("shipt Aye, Captain. Activating my turret")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Ship\): \w+ says, \"(\w+), turret on\."$

Trigger.name: Turret Off
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == gmcp.Char.Name.name then disableTrigger("Gunner") tempTimer(0.1, [[send("shipt Aye, Captain. Deactivating my turret")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Ship\): \w+ says, \"(\w+), turret off\."$

Trigger.name: Collector On Targetted
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == gmcp.Char.Name.name then enableTrigger("Collector") tempTimer(0.1, [[send("shipt Aye, Captain. Activating my collector")]]) send("config shipsight 1") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Ship\): (\w+) says, \"(\w+), siphon on.\"$

Trigger.name: Collector Off Targetted
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == gmcp.Char.Name.name then disableTrigger("Collector") tempTimer(0.1, [[send("shipt Aye, Captain. Deactivating my collector")]]) send("config shipsight 0") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Ship\): (\w+) says, \"(\w+), siphon off.\"$

Trigger.script: expandAlias("hunt off")

regexCodeList.string: implodes and your body is instantly torn apart by the unstable reality of theAetherways\.$

Trigger.name: Gnome traders
Trigger.script: send("pilot steer " ..matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: glides off towards the (\w+)\.$

Timer.name: Shockwaves Expired
Timer.command: shipt Attention! The shockwaves have expired!

Timer.name: Five Minute Announcement
Timer.command: shipt Attention! The shockwaves will expire in five minutes!

Timer.name: Fifteen Minute Announcement
Timer.command: shipt Attention! The shockwaves will expire in fifteen minutes!

Alias.name: Steer
Alias.script: send("pilot steer " .. matches[2]) disableTrigger("Autopilot") disableTrigger("Siphon Callout")

Alias.name: Glide
Alias.script:
local direction = ""
if #matches[2] == 2 then direction = string.sub(matches[2], 2, -1) else direction = string.sub(matches[2], 3, -1) end
send("pilot glide " .. direction) disableTrigger("Autopilot") disableTrigger("Siphon Callout")

Alias.name: Toggle Autopilot
Toggle Siphon Callout
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then dreadnought.pilot.siphonCallout = true enableTrigger("Siphon Callout") dmsg("Siphon callout mode activated.") elseif matches[2] == "off" then dreadnought.pilot.siphonCallout = false enableTrigger("Siphon Callout") dmsg("Siphon callout mode deactivated.") end

Alias.name: Pathing
Alias.script:
--[[ Please don't tinker with this unless you know what you're doing!!! ]]--
local pos1 = matches[2] local pos2 = matches[3] local pos3 = matches[4]
local oppositeOf = function (position) local cardinal = {"n", "ne", "e", "se", "s", "sw", "w", "nw"} local index = 1 for _,pos in ipairs(cardinal) do if position == pos then return cardinal[(index + 4) % 8] else index = (index + 1) % 8 end end end
dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition = 1
dreadnought.pilot.paths = { { next = pos1, home = "" },
{ next = pos2, home = oppositeOf(pos1) },
{ next = oppositeOf(pos2), home = pos3 } }
dmsg("Autopilot path set up.")

Alias.name: Reset
Alias.script: if #matches > 1 then dreadnought.pilot.reset() else dmsg("This will reset ALL piloting variables. Please type 'preset confirm' to confirm.") end

Alias.name: Run Silent
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then send("pilot silentrun start") else send("pilot silentrun stop") end

Alias.name: Farhorizon
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then send("pilot farhorizon start") else send("pilot farhorizon stop") end

Alias.name: Grid Setup
Alias.script:
if gmcp.Char.Skills.List.list[29] == "Purser" then dreadnought.empath.flags.haveClarity = true else dreadnought.empath.flags.haveClarity = false end
dreadnought.empath.modules.turrets = {} dreadnought.empath.modules.collectors = {} enableTrigger("Grid Setup") send("grid modules")

Alias.name: Grid Repair
Alias.script: if #matches > 1 then if matches[2] == "reset" then dreadnought.empath.commands = heap.new() dmsg("Resetting the repairing queue.") end else dmsg("Repairing the ship.") dreadnought.repairShip() end

Alias.name: Slivven Check
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Slivven Check") send("grid modules")

Alias.name: Clarity
Alias.script: send("grid clarity " .. dreadnought.modules.chair)

Alias.name: Enable/Disable Turret
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then enableTrigger("Gunner") send("shipt Activating my turret, Captain. Ready to blast our enemies from the aethers!") else disableTrigger("Gunner") send("shipt Deactivating my turret, Captain. Standing by!") end

Alias.name: Target Gathering Mode
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "call" then disableTrigger("Auto Target") enableTrigger("Callout Target") send("shipt You call out the targets, Captain, and I'll blast them from the aethers!") else enableTrigger("Auto Target") disableTrigger("Callout Target") send("shipt I've got my eyes trained upon the aethers, Captain! Should I see an aetherbeast, I'll blast it to smithereens!") end

Alias.name: Targetting
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "reset" then dreadnought.combateer.targets = {} dmsg("Resetting the list of targets") elseif matches[2] == "list" then local msg = "Current list of targets:" for _,t in ipairs(dreadnought.combateer.targets) do msg = msg .. " " .. t end
dmsg(msg) else table.insert(dreadnought.combateer.targets, matches[2]) dmsg("Adding to the list of targets: " .. matches[2]) dreadnought.fireTurret() end

Alias.name: Siphoning Enable Toggle
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then enableTrigger("Collector") send("shipt My collector has been enabled and is ready for use, Captain") send("config shipsight 1") else disableTrigger("Collector") send("shipt My collector has been disabled, Captain") send("config shipsight 0") end

Alias.name: Siphoning Mode
Alias.script:
enableTrigger("Collector") send("config shipsight 1")
if matches[2] == "auto" then enableTrigger("Siphoning - Auto") disableTrigger("Siphoning - Callout") else enableTrigger("Siphoning - Callout") disableTrigger("Siphoning - Auto") end

Alias.name: Gagall
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Turret_Gags") enableTrigger("Empath_Gags") enableTrigger("Beast_Gags") enableTrigger("Move_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now gagging <red> Turret<green>,<red> Empath<green>,<red> Beast<green>, <red>Move. <Green> To ungag these you will need to <red> ungagall <green>or<red> ungag(module)")

Alias.name: ungagall
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Turret_Gags") disableTrigger("Empath_Gags") disableTrigger("Beast_Gags") disableTrigger("Move_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now ungagging <red> Turret<green>,<red> Empath<green>,<red> Beast<green>, <red>Move. <Green> To gag these you will need to <red> gagall <green>or<red> gag(module)")

Alias.name: gagturret
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Turret_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now gagging <red> Turret<green>. <Green> To ungag these you will need to <red> ungagall <green>or<red> ungag(module)")

Alias.name: ungagturret
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Turret_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now ungagging <red> Turret<green>. <Green> To gag these you will need to <red> gagall <green>or<red> gag(module)")

Alias.name: Gagempath
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Empath_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now gagging <red> Empath<green>. <Green> To ungag these you will need to <red> ungagall <green>or<red> ungag(module)")

Alias.name: ungagempath
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Empath_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now ungagging <red> Empath<green>. <Green> To gag these you will need to <red> gagall <green>or<red> gag(module)")

Alias.name: Gagbeast
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Beast_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now gagging <red> Beast<green>. <Green> To ungag these you will need to <red> ungagall <green>or<red> ungag(module)")

Alias.name: Ungagbeast
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Beast_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now ungagging <red> Beast<green>. <Green> To gag these you will need to <red> gagall <green>or<red> gag(module)")

Alias.name: Gagmove
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Move_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now gagging <red> Move<green>. <Green> To ungag these you will need to <red> ungagall <green>or<red> ungag(module)")

Alias.name: Ungagmove
Alias.script: disableTrigger("Move_Gags") cecho("\n <green> You are now ungagging <red> Move<green>. <Green> To gag these you will need to <red> gagall <green>or<red> gag(module)")

Alias.name: Finish Hunting
Alias.script:
disableTrigger("Pilot") disableTrigger("Autopilot") disableAlias("Pilot")
disableTrigger("Empath") disableAlias("Empath")
disableTrigger("Gunner") disableAlias("Gunner")
disableTrigger("Collector") disableAlias("Collector")
dmsg("All Dreadnought reflexes have been disabled.")

ScriptGroup.name: Dreadnought
Pilot

Script.name: Autopilot
Script.script: function dreadnought.autopilot() if dreadnought.aetherbeastCount > 0 then if dreadnought.pilot.aetherbeastPresent and not dreadnought.pilot.shocked then -- There's an aetherbeast! Quick, run away! dreadnought.nextPosition() end else -- No more aetherbeasts; head back to the vortex if dreadnought.balance and not dreadnought.pilot.shocked then dreadnought.steerHome() end end end

Script.name: Next Position
Script.script:
function dreadnought.nextPosition() local currentPosition = dreadnought.pilot.paths[dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition] local nextPosition = currentPosition.next
send("pilot steer " .. nextPosition)
if dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition == 1 or dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition == 2 then dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition = dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition + 1 else dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition = 2 end end

Script.name: Steer Home
Script.script:
function dreadnought.steerHome() local currentPosition = dreadnought.pilot.paths[dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition]
if currentPosition.home ~= "" then send("pilot steer " .. currentPosition.home) dreadnought.pilot.currentPosition = 1 else dmsg("You're already at the home position!") end end

ScriptGroup.name: Empath

Script.name: Repair Ship
Script.script: function dreadnought.repairShip() if dreadnought.balance then if dreadnought.empath.commands.size > 0 then heap.head(dreadnought.empath.commands).command() end end end

ScriptGroup.name: Combateer

Script.name: Fire Turret
Script.script:
function dreadnought.fireTurret() local shockwaveCalled = dreadnought.combateer.shockwaveCalled local vortexCalled = dreadnought.combateer.vortexCalled local targets = dreadnought.combateer.targets local targetAcquired = dreadnought.combateer.targetAcquired
if dreadnought.balance then if shockwaveCalled then send("turret shockwave") elseif vortexCalled then send("turret vortex") else local currentTarget = targets[1] if currentTarget ~= nil then if targetAcquired then send("turret fire") else send("turret target creature " .. currentTarget) end end end end end

Script.name: Siphon Vortex
Script.script: function dreadnought.siphonVortex() if dreadnought.aetherbeastCount == 0 then send("siphon vortex") else send("shipt I don't think that's a good idea, Captain. There are aetherbeasts about!") end end

Script.name: Heap
Script.script:
heap = { new = function() return { size = 0, elements = {} } end,
_exch = function(h, x, y) assert(type(x) == "number") assert(type(y) == "number")
local temp = h.elements[x] h.elements[x] = h.elements[y] h.elements[y] = temp end,
_sink = function(h, parentIndex) local N = h.size
while (parentIndex*2) <= N do local childIndex = parentIndex * 2
if childIndex < N and lowerPriority(h.elements[childIndex], h.elements[childIndex+1]) then childIndex = childIndex + 1 end
if not lowerPriority(h.elements[parentIndex], h.elements[childIndex]) then break else heap._exch(h, parentIndex, childIndex) parentIndex = childIndex end end end,
_swim = function(h, childIndex) while childIndex > 1 and lowerPriority(h.elements[math.floor(childIndex/2)], h.elements[childIndex]) do local parentIndex = math.floor(childIndex / 2) heap._exch(h, childIndex, parentIndex) childIndex = parentIndex end end,
insert = function(h, element) table.insert(h.elements, element) h.size = h.size + 1
heap._swim(h, h.size) end,
extract = function(h) heap._exch(h, 1, h.size) h.size = h.size - 1 local ret = table.remove(h.elements)
heap._sink(h, 1)
return ret end,
head = function(h) local element = h.elements[1] return element end }

Script.name: Action
Flowerbox
Script.script:
function flowerbox(color, text) local text = "\n# " .. text .. " #"
local function printLine(line) if line == nil then echo("\n") for i=1, #text-1 do cecho("<" .. color .. ">#") end else cecho("<" .. color .. ">" .. line) end end
printLine() printLine(text) printLine() end

Script.name: DeleteLineP
Script.script: function deleteLineP() deleteLine() tempLineTrigger(1,1,[[ if string.find(line, "%d-hull, .*") then deleteLine() end ]]) end

Script.name: Lower Priority
